description:
Secure collaboration and messaging

Element is a Matrix-based end-to-end encrypted messenger and secure collaboration app. Itâ€™s decentralized for digital sovereign self-hosting, or through a hosting service such as Element Matrix Services. Element operates on the open Matrix network to provide interoperability and easy connections.
This release fixes High severity vulnerability CVE-2024-47771 / GHSA-963w-49j9-gxj6.
